title: Decision ConvFormer: Local Filtering in MetaFormer is Sufficient for Decision Making. (arXiv:2310.03022v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: The recent success of Transformer in natural language processing has sparked its use in various domains. In offline reinforcement learning (RL), Decision Transformer (DT) is emerging as a promising model based on Transformer. However, we discovered that the attention module of DT is not appropriate to capture the inherent local dependence pattern in trajectories of RL modeled as a Markov decision process. To overcome the limitations of DT, we propose a novel action sequence predictor, named Decision ConvFormer (DC), based on the architecture of MetaFormer, which is a general structure to process multiple entities in parallel and understand the interrelationship among the multiple entities. DC employs local convolution filtering as the token mixer and can effectively capture the inherent local associations of the RL dataset. translated_title: Decision ConvFormer: MetaFormer中的本地过滤对于决策制定已经足够了
translated_abstract: Transformer在自然语言处理中的成功引发了其在各个领域的应用。在离线强化学习中，Decision Transformer（DT）作为一种基于Transformer的有前途的模型逐渐崭露头角。然而，我们发现DT的注意力模块不适合捕捉作为马尔科夫决策过程建模的强化学习轨迹中固有的局部依赖模式。为了解决DT的局限性，我们提出了一种基于MetaFormer架构的新型动作序列预测器，称为Decision ConvFormer（DC）。DC采用本地卷积过滤作为令牌混合器，能够有效捕捉RL数据集中固有的局部关联。在大量实验证明中，DC在各种标准RL基准上取得了最先进的性能，同时需要更少的资源。
tldr: Decision ConvFormer提出了一种新的动作序列预测器，通过使用本地卷积过滤来捕捉强化学习数据集中的局部关联，同时在各个标准RL基准上取得了最先进的性能。
en_tdlr: Decision ConvFormer proposes a novel action sequence predictor that captures local associations in the reinforcement learning dataset using local convolution filtering, and achieves state-of-the-art performance on various standard RL benchmarks.
